TopicTitle: SCF Home base + 7/8/15 Spacecraft friday [Looking for you!]

Articles.Content: Alright, I'm looking for anyone to do it. I haven't gotten a response from the list of maintainers, and I'm too busy.
I could probably do it later, but i am busy right now, and i dont really want to take two weeks in a row..

[quote name='Bubbadevlin']I could probably do it later, but i am busy right now, and i dont really want to take two weeks in a row..[/QUOTE]  

Don't worry, I'm sure someone else can do it.

[quote name='Mad Rocket Scientist']Don't worry, I'm sure someone else can do it.[/QUOTE]  

So what happens now? Skip this week and do a double week next time?
If you guys like, I return home tomorrow morning and I've got a day off work, might compile a list of stuff I want to test tonight.

[quote name='BlueCanary']So what happens now? Skip this week and do a double week next time?[/QUOTE]  

We'll just get it done as soon as possible, and then resume our normal schedule.  

[quote name='Azimech']If you guys like, I return home tomorrow morning and I've got a day off work, might compile a list of stuff I want to test tonight.[/QUOTE]  

Okay, that sounds good!
I can take my slot next week. But if it's pushed to the 4th I have to bail and postpone. Sorry this weekend been tied up with schoolwork and having to prep the Suzuki for its winter nap.
Alright, I fixed the BBcode on the OP.

Running low on volunteers ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D") If you want to be a maintainer just reply to this thread and MRS will add you to the list. 

Speaking of that, MRS can you put me as substitute for PTrevTrevs just in case he can't do it.

I'd like to be a maintainer, if possible. Any way I could be added to the list? I'm free any day. However, due to my timezone (GMT+8), Friday for me is very late Thursday or very early Friday GMT depending on what time it is here. Should I post it on early Saturday my time?
